Reviews.Title: internet dangle is easy to be broken.
Reviews.Author: zhongkui
Reviews.Content: i like this machine, but the internet adapter is easy to be broken. The plug is too thin. the original adapter was broken within three months.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Seong Cheol Suh
Reviews.Content: this product is amazing and awesome!it is easy to portable and use.most of all, it's very light and thin.function is also good!
